@WorldRugby Rules no longer/selectively applied in #rugbyâ€¦Why? Last foot. Behind kicker @ kick-off/drop-out (see Castres 10). In from side. Driving off feet. Rolling away from ball at breakdown. Double movement on ground. Forward pass. #Free4All #U20WorldChampionships

@travelgenio Look at the @AerLingus reply above. They admit that the booking made by you, on their system with both flights having the same â€œEIâ€ AerLingus booking code does not leave enough time between LHR @ LGW but u still want to charge penalties? @aviationreg @CCPCIreland @eoghancorry

@travelgenio Look at the @AerLingus reply above. They admit that the booking made by you, on their system with both flights having the same AerLingus booking code does not leave enough time between LHR @ LGW but u still want to charge penalties? @aviationreg @CCPCIreland

@AerLingus @travelgenio @aviationreg @CCPCIreland I am not asking you to delay a flight. I am asking @WestJet to keep his seat from Gatwick to Vancouver if he does not board the Dublin-Heathrow leg of flight.

@AerLingus Thank you 4 admitting there is not enough time 2 get 2 Gatwick. The 3rd party @Travelgenio say they were allowed book flight on your booking system & that flight was plotted on your system & say that you only allow changes with PENALTIES of â‚¬200-â‚¬300 @aviationreg @CCPCIreland

@WestJet my son was sold a â‚¬467 1 way/2 flight tkt landing @ Heathrow only 50mins before check-in @ Gatwick (38 miles away) this Friday. Will you hold his seat to Vancouver open if he doesn't take @AerLingus flight but comes to your check-in on time at Gatwick? #HaveAâ¤ï¸ ðŸâ˜˜ï¸
